headline: Arch Capital (ACGL) Q4 2025 Earnings Transcript
summary: For the full year, we produced $3.7 billion of after-tax operating income, a new high, resulting in after-tax operating earnings per share of $9.84 and a 17.1% annualized operating return on average common equity for 2025.  Continued strong operating cash flows and capital generation enabled the repurchase of $1.9 billion of Arch common stock in 2025.  Since our start in 2001, book value per share has grown at a compound annual growth rate in excess of 15%, placing us at the top of our peer group.

raw.headline: Arch Capital (ACGL) Q4 2025 Earnings Transcript
raw.summary: For the full year, we produced $3.7 billion of after-tax operating income, a new high, resulting in after-tax operating earnings per share of $9.84 and a 17.1% annualized operating return on average common equity for 2025.  Continued strong operating cash flows and capital generation enabled the repurchase of $1.9 billion of Arch common stock in 2025.  Since our start in 2001, book value per share has grown at a compound annual growth rate in excess of 15%, placing us at the top of our peer group.

headline: The Bull Case For Arch Capital Group (ACGL) Could Change Following Strong 2025 Results And Underwriting Outperformance – Learn Why
summary: Arch Capital Group Ltd. recently reported full-year 2025 results, with revenue rising to US$19.93 billion and net income of US$4.40 billion, alongside fourth-quarter earnings and revenue that exceeded analyst expectations. An interesting aspect of the update is the combination of stronger underwriting performance and a very strong balance sheet highlighted by analysts as key strengths.
